message: Accept and we can call it a day!
Take it or leave it, I'm not going down to 4000!
You're getting closer to meeting me halfway, but I still think I'm the one who should get more!
I'm not getting any younger, let's make a deal!
You're getting closer, but I'm not budging - I want more!
You're running out of time, Bob - meet me at this price!
I'm not desperate yet, but I'm getting there - don't think you can take advantage of me!
Last chance, Bob - this is my final offer!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of - I'll get what I deserve!
